      <tr>
        <td id="L185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="185"></td>
        <td id="LC185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She was half sorry her sagacity had miscarried, and half glad that Tom</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="186"></td>
        <td id="LC186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had stumbled into obedient conduct for once.</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In a safe place Tom examined two large needles which were thrust into</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well why don&#39;t you DO it? You SAY you can do it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="281"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well I WILL, if you fool with me.&quot;</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

        <td id="L378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="378"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="379"></td>
        <td id="LC379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The new boy went off brushing the dust from his clothes, sobbing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="380"></td>
        <td id="LC380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">snuffling, and occasionally looking back and shaking his head and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="381"></td>
        <td id="LC381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">threatening what he would do to Tom the &quot;next time he caught him out.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="382"></td>
        <td id="LC382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To which Tom responded with jeers, and started off in high feather, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="383"></td>
        <td id="LC383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as soon as his back was turned the new boy snatched up a stone, threw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="384"></td>
        <td id="LC384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it and hit him between the shoulders and then turned tail and ran like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="385"></td>
        <td id="LC385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an antelope. Tom chased the traitor home, and thus found out where he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="386"></td>
        <td id="LC386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lived. He then held a position at the gate for some time, daring the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="387"></td>
        <td id="LC387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enemy to come outside, but the enemy only made faces at him through the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="388"></td>
        <td id="LC388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">window and declined. At last the enemy&#39;s mother appeared, and called</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="389"></td>
        <td id="LC389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom a bad, vicious, vulgar child, and ordered him away. So he went</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="390"></td>
        <td id="LC390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away; but he said he &quot;&#39;lowed&quot; to &quot;lay&quot; for that boy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="391"></td>
        <td id="LC391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="392"></td>
        <td id="LC392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He got home pretty late that night, and when he climbed cautiously in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="393"></td>
        <td id="LC393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at the window, he uncovered an ambuscade, in the person of his aunt;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="394"></td>
        <td id="LC394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and when she saw the state his clothes were in her resolution to turn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="395"></td>
        <td id="LC395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his Saturday holiday into captivity at hard labor became adamantine in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="396"></td>
        <td id="LC396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">its firmness.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="397"></td>
        <td id="LC397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="398"></td>
        <td id="LC398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="399"></td>
        <td id="LC399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="400"></td>
        <td id="LC400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER II</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="401"></td>
        <td id="LC401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="402"></td>
        <td id="LC402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">SATURDAY morning was come, and all the summer world was bright and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="403"></td>
        <td id="LC403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fresh, and brimming with life. There was a song in every heart; and if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="404"></td>
        <td id="LC404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the heart was young the music issued at the lips. There was cheer in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="405"></td>
        <td id="LC405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every face and a spring in every step. The locust-trees were in bloom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="406"></td>
        <td id="LC406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the fragrance of the blossoms filled the air. Cardiff Hill, beyond</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="407"></td>
        <td id="LC407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the village and above it, was green with vegetation and it lay just far</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="408"></td>
        <td id="LC408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enough away to seem a Delectable Land, dreamy, reposeful, and inviting.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="409"></td>
        <td id="LC409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="410"></td>
        <td id="LC410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom appeared on the sidewalk with a bucket of whitewash and a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="411"></td>
        <td id="LC411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long-handled brush. He surveyed the fence, and all gladness left him and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="412"></td>
        <td id="LC412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a deep melancholy settled down upon his spirit. Thirty yards of board</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="413"></td>
        <td id="LC413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fence nine feet high. Life to him seemed hollow, and existence but a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="414"></td>
        <td id="LC414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">burden. Sighing, he dipped his brush and passed it along the topmost</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="415"></td>
        <td id="LC415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">plank; repeated the operation; did it again; compared the insignificant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="416"></td>
        <td id="LC416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whitewashed streak with the far-reaching continent of unwhitewashed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="417"></td>
        <td id="LC417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fence, and sat down on a tree-box discouraged. Jim came skipping out at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="418"></td>
        <td id="LC418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the gate with a tin pail, and singing Buffalo Gals. Bringing water from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="419"></td>
        <td id="LC419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the town pump had always been hateful work in Tom&#39;s eyes, before, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="420"></td>
        <td id="LC420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now it did not strike him so. He remembered that there was company at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="421"></td>
        <td id="LC421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the pump. White, mulatto, and negro boys and girls were always there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="422"></td>
        <td id="LC422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waiting their turns, resting, trading playthings, quarrelling,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="423"></td>
        <td id="LC423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fighting, skylarking. And he remembered that although the pump was only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="424"></td>
        <td id="LC424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a hundred and fifty yards off, Jim never got back with a bucket of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="425"></td>
        <td id="LC425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">water under an hour--and even then somebody generally had to go after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="426"></td>
        <td id="LC426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him. Tom said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="427"></td>
        <td id="LC427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="428"></td>
        <td id="LC428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Say, Jim, I&#39;ll fetch the water if you&#39;ll whitewash some.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="429"></td>
        <td id="LC429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="430"></td>
        <td id="LC430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jim shook his head and said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="431"></td>
        <td id="LC431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="432"></td>
        <td id="LC432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Can&#39;t, Mars Tom. Ole missis, she tole me I got to go an&#39; git dis</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="433"></td>
        <td id="LC433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">water an&#39; not stop foolin&#39; roun&#39; wid anybody. She say she spec&#39; Mars</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="434"></td>
        <td id="LC434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom gwine to ax me to whitewash, an&#39; so she tole me go &#39;long an&#39; &#39;tend</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="435"></td>
        <td id="LC435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to my own business--she &#39;lowed SHE&#39;D &#39;tend to de whitewashin&#39;.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="436"></td>
        <td id="LC436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="437"></td>
        <td id="LC437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, never you mind what she said, Jim. That&#39;s the way she always</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="438"></td>
        <td id="LC438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">talks. Gimme the bucket--I won&#39;t be gone only a a minute. SHE won&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="439"></td>
        <td id="LC439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ever know.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="440"></td>
        <td id="LC440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="441"></td>
        <td id="LC441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, I dasn&#39;t, Mars Tom. Ole missis she&#39;d take an&#39; tar de head off&#39;n</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="442"></td>
        <td id="LC442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me. &#39;Deed she would.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="443"></td>
        <td id="LC443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="444"></td>
        <td id="LC444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;SHE! She never licks anybody--whacks &#39;em over the head with her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="445"></td>
        <td id="LC445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thimble--and who cares for that, I&#39;d like to know. She talks awful, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="446"></td>
        <td id="LC446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">talk don&#39;t hurt--anyways it don&#39;t if she don&#39;t cry. Jim, I&#39;ll give you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="447"></td>
        <td id="LC447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a marvel. I&#39;ll give you a white alley!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="448"></td>
        <td id="LC448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="449"></td>
        <td id="LC449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jim began to waver.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="450"></td>
        <td id="LC450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="451"></td>
        <td id="LC451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;White alley, Jim! And it&#39;s a bully taw.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="452"></td>
        <td id="LC452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="453"></td>
        <td id="LC453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My! Dat&#39;s a mighty gay marvel, I tell you! But Mars Tom I&#39;s powerful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="454"></td>
        <td id="LC454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;fraid ole missis--&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="455"></td>
        <td id="LC455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="456"></td>
        <td id="LC456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And besides, if you will I&#39;ll show you my sore toe.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="457"></td>
        <td id="LC457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="458"></td>
        <td id="LC458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jim was only human--this attraction was too much for him. He put down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="459"></td>
        <td id="LC459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his pail, took the white alley, and bent over the toe with absorbing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="460"></td>
        <td id="LC460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interest while the bandage was being unwound. In another moment he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="461"></td>
        <td id="LC461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flying down the street with his pail and a tingling rear, Tom was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="462"></td>
        <td id="LC462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whitewashing with vigor, and Aunt Polly was retiring from the field</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="463"></td>
        <td id="LC463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a slipper in her hand and triumph in her eye.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="464"></td>
        <td id="LC464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="465"></td>
        <td id="LC465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But Tom&#39;s energy did not last. He began to think of the fun he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="466"></td>
        <td id="LC466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">planned for this day, and his sorrows multiplied. Soon the free boys</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="467"></td>
        <td id="LC467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would come tripping along on all sorts of delicious expeditions, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="468"></td>
        <td id="LC468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they would make a world of fun of him for having to work--the very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="469"></td>
        <td id="LC469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thought of it burnt him like fire. He got out his worldly wealth and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="470"></td>
        <td id="LC470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">examined it--bits of toys, marbles, and trash; enough to buy an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="471"></td>
        <td id="LC471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exchange of WORK, maybe, but not half enough to buy so much as half an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="472"></td>
        <td id="LC472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hour of pure freedom. So he returned his straitened means to his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="473"></td>
        <td id="LC473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pocket, and gave up the idea of trying to buy the boys. At this dark</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="474"></td>
        <td id="LC474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and hopeless moment an inspiration burst upon him! Nothing less than a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="475"></td>
        <td id="LC475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great, magnificent inspiration.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="476"></td>
        <td id="LC476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="477"></td>
        <td id="LC477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He took up his brush and went tranquilly to work. Ben Rogers hove in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="478"></td>
        <td id="LC478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sight presently--the very boy, of all boys, whose ridicule he had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="479"></td>
        <td id="LC479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dreading. Ben&#39;s gait was the hop-skip-and-jump--proof enough that his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="480"></td>
        <td id="LC480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heart was light and his anticipations high. He was eating an apple, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="481"></td>
        <td id="LC481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">giving a long, melodious whoop, at intervals, followed by a deep-toned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="482"></td>
        <td id="LC482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ding-dong-dong, ding-dong-dong, for he was personating a steamboat. As</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="483"></td>
        <td id="LC483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he drew near, he slackened speed, took the middle of the street, leaned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="484"></td>
        <td id="LC484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">far over to starboard and rounded to ponderously and with laborious</td>

        <td id="L485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="485"></td>

        <td id="L486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="486"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="666"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="761"></td>
        <td id="LC761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Umf! Well, you didn&#39;t get a lick amiss, I reckon. You been into some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="762"></td>
        <td id="LC762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other audacious mischief when I wasn&#39;t around, like enough.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="763"></td>
        <td id="LC763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="764"></td>
        <td id="LC764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then her conscience reproached her, and she yearned to say something</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="765"></td>
        <td id="LC765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kind and loving; but she judged that this would be construed into a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="766"></td>
        <td id="LC766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confession that she had been in the wrong, and discipline forbade that.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="767"></td>
        <td id="LC767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So she kept silence, and went about her affairs with a troubled heart.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="768"></td>
        <td id="LC768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom sulked in a corner and exalted his woes. He knew that in her heart</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="769"></td>
        <td id="LC769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his aunt was on her knees to him, and he was morosely gratified by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="770"></td>
        <td id="LC770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consciousness of it. He would hang out no signals, he would take notice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="771"></td>
        <td id="LC771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of none. He knew that a yearning glance fell upon him, now and then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="772"></td>
        <td id="LC772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through a film of tears, but he refused recognition of it. He pictured</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="842"></td>
        <td id="LC842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER IV</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="843"></td>
        <td id="LC843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="844"></td>
        <td id="LC844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THE sun rose upon a tranquil world, and beamed down upon the peaceful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="845"></td>
        <td id="LC845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">village like a benediction. Breakfast over, Aunt Polly had family</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="846"></td>
        <td id="LC846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">worship: it began with a prayer built from the ground up of solid</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="847"></td>
        <td id="LC847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">courses of Scriptural quotations, welded together with a thin mortar of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="848"></td>
        <td id="LC848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">originality; and from the summit of this she delivered a grim chapter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="849"></td>
        <td id="LC849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the Mosaic Law, as from Sinai.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="850"></td>
        <td id="LC850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="851"></td>
        <td id="LC851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then Tom girded up his loins, so to speak, and went to work to &quot;get</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="852"></td>
        <td id="LC852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his verses.&quot; Sid had learned his lesson days before. Tom bent all his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="853"></td>
        <td id="LC853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">energies to the memorizing of five verses, and he chose part of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="854"></td>
        <td id="LC854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sermon on the Mount, because he could find no verses that were shorter.</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1783"></td>
        <td id="LC1783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1784"></td>
        <td id="LC1784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Now, sir, go and sit with the girls! And let this be a warning to you.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1785"></td>
        <td id="LC1785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1786"></td>
        <td id="LC1786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The titter that rippled around the room appeared to abash the boy, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1787"></td>
        <td id="LC1787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in reality that result was caused rather more by his worshipful awe of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1788"></td>
        <td id="LC1788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his unknown idol and the dread pleasure that lay in his high good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1789"></td>
        <td id="LC1789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fortune. He sat down upon the end of the pine bench and the girl</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1790"></td>
        <td id="LC1790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hitched herself away from him with a toss of her head. Nudges and winks</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1791"></td>
        <td id="LC1791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and whispers traversed the room, but Tom sat still, with his arms upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1792"></td>
        <td id="LC1792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the long, low desk before him, and seemed to study his book.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1793"></td>
        <td id="LC1793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1794"></td>
        <td id="LC1794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">By and by attention ceased from him, and the accustomed school murmur</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1795"></td>
        <td id="LC1795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rose upon the dull air once more. Presently the boy began to steal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1796"></td>
        <td id="LC1796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">furtive glances at the girl. She observed it, &quot;made a mouth&quot; at him and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1797"></td>
        <td id="LC1797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gave him the back of her head for the space of a minute. When she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1798"></td>
        <td id="LC1798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cautiously faced around again, a peach lay before her. She thrust it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1799"></td>
        <td id="LC1799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away. Tom gently put it back. She thrust it away again, but with less</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1800"></td>
        <td id="LC1800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">animosity. Tom patiently returned it to its place. Then she let it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1801"></td>
        <td id="LC1801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remain. Tom scrawled on his slate, &quot;Please take it--I got more.&quot; The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1802"></td>
        <td id="LC1802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">girl glanced at the words, but made no sign. Now the boy began to draw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1803"></td>
        <td id="LC1803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">something on the slate, hiding his work with his left hand. For a time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1804"></td>
        <td id="LC1804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the girl refused to notice; but her human curiosity presently began to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1805"></td>
        <td id="LC1805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manifest itself by hardly perceptible signs. The boy worked on,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1806"></td>
        <td id="LC1806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">apparently unconscious. The girl made a sort of noncommittal attempt to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1807"></td>
        <td id="LC1807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see, but the boy did not betray that he was aware of it. At last she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1808"></td>
        <td id="LC1808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gave in and hesitatingly whispered:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1809"></td>
        <td id="LC1809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1810"></td>
        <td id="LC1810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Let me see it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1811"></td>
        <td id="LC1811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1812"></td>
        <td id="LC1812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom partly uncovered a dismal caricature of a house with two gable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1813"></td>
        <td id="LC1813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ends to it and a corkscrew of smoke issuing from the chimney. Then the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1814"></td>
        <td id="LC1814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">girl&#39;s interest began to fasten itself upon the work and she forgot</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1815"></td>
        <td id="LC1815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">everything else. When it was finished, she gazed a moment, then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1816"></td>
        <td id="LC1816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whispered:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1817"></td>
        <td id="LC1817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1818"></td>
        <td id="LC1818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It&#39;s nice--make a man.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1819"></td>
        <td id="LC1819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1820"></td>
        <td id="LC1820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The artist erected a man in the front yard, that resembled a derrick.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1821"></td>
        <td id="LC1821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He could have stepped over the house; but the girl was not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1822"></td>
        <td id="LC1822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hypercritical; she was satisfied with the monster, and whispered:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1823"></td>
        <td id="LC1823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1824"></td>
        <td id="LC1824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It&#39;s a beautiful man--now make me coming along.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1825"></td>
        <td id="LC1825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1826"></td>
        <td id="LC1826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom drew an hour-glass with a full moon and straw limbs to it and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1827"></td>
        <td id="LC1827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">armed the spreading fingers with a portentous fan. The girl said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1828"></td>
        <td id="LC1828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1829"></td>
        <td id="LC1829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It&#39;s ever so nice--I wish I could draw.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1830"></td>
        <td id="LC1830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1831"></td>
        <td id="LC1831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It&#39;s easy,&quot; whispered Tom, &quot;I&#39;ll learn you.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1832"></td>
        <td id="LC1832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1833"></td>
        <td id="LC1833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, will you? When?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1834"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1835"></td>
        <td id="LC1835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;At noon. Do you go home to dinner?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1836"></td>
        <td id="LC1836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1837"></td>
        <td id="LC1837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I&#39;ll stay if you will.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1838"></td>
        <td id="LC1838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1839"></td>
        <td id="LC1839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Good--that&#39;s a whack. What&#39;s your name?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1840"></td>
        <td id="LC1840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1841"></td>
        <td id="LC1841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Becky Thatcher. What&#39;s yours? Oh, I know. It&#39;s Thomas Sawyer.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1842"></td>
        <td id="LC1842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1843"></td>
        <td id="LC1843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;That&#39;s the name they lick me by. I&#39;m Tom when I&#39;m good. You call me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1844"></td>
        <td id="LC1844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom, will you?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1845"></td>
        <td id="LC1845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1846"></td>
        <td id="LC1846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1847"></td>
        <td id="LC1847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1848"></td>
        <td id="LC1848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now Tom began to scrawl something on the slate, hiding the words from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1849"></td>
        <td id="LC1849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the girl. But she was not backward this time. She begged to see. Tom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1850"></td>
        <td id="LC1850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1851"></td>
        <td id="LC1851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1852"></td>
        <td id="LC1852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, it ain&#39;t anything.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1853"></td>
        <td id="LC1853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1854"></td>
        <td id="LC1854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes it is.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1855"></td>
        <td id="LC1855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1856"></td>
        <td id="LC1856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No it ain&#39;t. You don&#39;t want to see.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1857"></td>
        <td id="LC1857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1858"></td>
        <td id="LC1858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes I do, indeed I do. Please let me.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1859"></td>
        <td id="LC1859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1860"></td>
        <td id="LC1860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You&#39;ll tell.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1861"></td>
        <td id="LC1861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1862"></td>
        <td id="LC1862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No I won&#39;t--deed and deed and double deed won&#39;t.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1863"></td>
        <td id="LC1863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1864"></td>
        <td id="LC1864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You won&#39;t tell anybody at all? Ever, as long as you live?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1865"></td>
        <td id="LC1865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1866"></td>
        <td id="LC1866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No, I won&#39;t ever tell ANYbody. Now let me.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1867"></td>
        <td id="LC1867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1868"></td>
        <td id="LC1868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, YOU don&#39;t want to see!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1869"></td>
        <td id="LC1869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1870"></td>
        <td id="LC1870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Now that you treat me so, I WILL see.&quot; And she put her small hand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1871"></td>
        <td id="LC1871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon his and a little scuffle ensued, Tom pretending to resist in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1872"></td>
        <td id="LC1872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">earnest but letting his hand slip by degrees till these words were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1873"></td>
        <td id="LC1873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">revealed: &quot;I LOVE YOU.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1874"></td>
        <td id="LC1874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1875"></td>
        <td id="LC1875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, you bad thing!&quot; And she hit his hand a smart rap, but reddened</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1876"></td>
        <td id="LC1876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and looked pleased, nevertheless.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1877"></td>
        <td id="LC1877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1878"></td>
        <td id="LC1878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Just at this juncture the boy felt a slow, fateful grip closing on his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1879"></td>
        <td id="LC1879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ear, and a steady lifting impulse. In that wise he was borne across the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1880"></td>
        <td id="LC1880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house and deposited in his own seat, under a peppering fire of giggles</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1881"></td>
        <td id="LC1881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the whole school. Then the master stood over him during a few</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1882"></td>
        <td id="LC1882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">awful moments, and finally moved away to his throne without saying a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1883"></td>
        <td id="LC1883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">word. But although Tom&#39;s ear tingled, his heart was jubilant.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1884"></td>
        <td id="LC1884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1885"></td>
        <td id="LC1885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As the school quieted down Tom made an honest effort to study, but the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1886"></td>
        <td id="LC1886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turmoil within him was too great. In turn he took his place in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1887"></td>
        <td id="LC1887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reading class and made a botch of it; then in the geography class and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1888"></td>
        <td id="LC1888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turned lakes into mountains, mountains into rivers, and rivers into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1889"></td>
        <td id="LC1889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">continents, till chaos was come again; then in the spelling class, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1890"></td>
        <td id="LC1890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">got &quot;turned down,&quot; by a succession of mere baby words, till he brought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1891"></td>
        <td id="LC1891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up at the foot and yielded up the pewter medal which he had worn with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1892"></td>
        <td id="LC1892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ostentation for months.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1893"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1894"></td>
        <td id="LC1894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1895"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1896"></td>
        <td id="LC1896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER VII</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1897"></td>
        <td id="LC1897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1898"></td>
        <td id="LC1898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THE harder Tom tried to fasten his mind on his book, the more his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1899"></td>
        <td id="LC1899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ideas wandered. So at last, with a sigh and a yawn, he gave it up. It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1900"></td>
        <td id="LC1900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seemed to him that the noon recess would never come. The air was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1901"></td>
        <td id="LC1901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">utterly dead. There was not a breath stirring. It was the sleepiest of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1902"></td>
        <td id="LC1902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sleepy days. The drowsing murmur of the five and twenty studying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1903"></td>
        <td id="LC1903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scholars soothed the soul like the spell that is in the murmur of bees.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1904"></td>
        <td id="LC1904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Away off in the flaming sunshine, Cardiff Hill lifted its soft green</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1905"></td>
        <td id="LC1905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sides through a shimmering veil of heat, tinted with the purple of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1906"></td>
        <td id="LC1906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distance; a few birds floated on lazy wing high in the air; no other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1907"></td>
        <td id="LC1907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">living thing was visible but some cows, and they were asleep. Tom&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1908"></td>
        <td id="LC1908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heart ached to be free, or else to have something of interest to do to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1909"></td>
        <td id="LC1909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pass the dreary time. His hand wandered into his pocket and his face</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1910"></td>
        <td id="LC1910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lit up with a glow of gratitude that was prayer, though he did not know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1911"></td>
        <td id="LC1911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it. Then furtively the percussion-cap box came out. He released the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1912"></td>
        <td id="LC1912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tick and put him on the long flat desk. The creature probably glowed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1913"></td>
        <td id="LC1913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a gratitude that amounted to prayer, too, at this moment, but it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1914"></td>
        <td id="LC1914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was premature: for when he started thankfully to travel off, Tom turned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1915"></td>
        <td id="LC1915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him aside with a pin and made him take a new direction.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1916"></td>
        <td id="LC1916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1917"></td>
        <td id="LC1917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom&#39;s bosom friend sat next him, suffering just as Tom had been, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1918"></td>
        <td id="LC1918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now he was deeply and gratefully interested in this entertainment in an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1919"></td>
        <td id="LC1919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instant. This bosom friend was Joe Harper. The two boys were sworn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1920"></td>
        <td id="LC1920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friends all the week, and embattled enemies on Saturdays. Joe took a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1921"></td>
        <td id="LC1921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pin out of his lapel and began to assist in exercising the prisoner.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1922"></td>
        <td id="LC1922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The sport grew in interest momently. Soon Tom said that they were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1923"></td>
        <td id="LC1923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interfering with each other, and neither getting the fullest benefit of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1924"></td>
        <td id="LC1924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the tick. So he put Joe&#39;s slate on the desk and drew a line down the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1925"></td>
        <td id="LC1925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">middle of it from top to bottom.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1926"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1927"></td>
        <td id="LC1927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Now,&quot; said he, &quot;as long as he is on your side you can stir him up and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1928"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1929"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1930"></td>
        <td id="LC1930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1932"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1933"></td>
        <td id="LC1933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The tick escaped from Tom, presently, and crossed the equator. Joe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1934"></td>
        <td id="LC1934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">harassed him awhile, and then he got away and crossed back again. This</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1935"></td>
        <td id="LC1935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">change of base occurred often. While one boy was worrying the tick with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1936"></td>
        <td id="LC1936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">absorbing interest, the other would look on with interest as strong,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1937"></td>
        <td id="LC1937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the two heads bowed together over the slate, and the two souls dead to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1938"></td>
        <td id="LC1938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all things else. At last luck seemed to settle and abide with Joe. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1939"></td>
        <td id="LC1939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tick tried this, that, and the other course, and got as excited and as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1940"></td>
        <td id="LC1940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anxious as the boys themselves, but time and again just as he would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1941"></td>
        <td id="LC1941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have victory in his very grasp, so to speak, and Tom&#39;s fingers would be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1942"></td>
        <td id="LC1942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">twitching to begin, Joe&#39;s pin would deftly head him off, and keep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1943"></td>
        <td id="LC1943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possession. At last Tom could stand it no longer. The temptation was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1944"></td>
        <td id="LC1944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">too strong. So he reached out and lent a hand with his pin. Joe was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1945"></td>
        <td id="LC1945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">angry in a moment. Said he:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1946"></td>
        <td id="LC1946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1947"></td>
        <td id="LC1947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Tom, you let him alone.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1948"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1949"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1950"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1951"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1956"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1957"></td>
        <td id="LC1957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I won&#39;t!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1958"></td>
        <td id="LC1958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1959"></td>
        <td id="LC1959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You shall--he&#39;s on my side of the line.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1960"></td>
        <td id="LC1960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1961"></td>
        <td id="LC1961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Look here, Joe Harper, whose is that tick?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1962"></td>
        <td id="LC1962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1963"></td>
        <td id="LC1963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I don&#39;t care whose tick he is--he&#39;s on my side of the line, and you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1964"></td>
        <td id="LC1964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sha&#39;n&#39;t touch him.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1965"></td>
        <td id="LC1965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1966"></td>
        <td id="LC1966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, I&#39;ll just bet I will, though. He&#39;s my tick and I&#39;ll do what I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1967"></td>
        <td id="LC1967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blame please with him, or die!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1968"></td>
        <td id="LC1968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1969"></td>
        <td id="LC1969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A tremendous whack came down on Tom&#39;s shoulders, and its duplicate on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1970"></td>
        <td id="LC1970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Joe&#39;s; and for the space of two minutes the dust continued to fly from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1971"></td>
        <td id="LC1971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the two jackets and the whole school to enjoy it. The boys had been too</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2070"></td>
        <td id="LC2070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2071"></td>
        <td id="LC2071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You turn your face away so you can&#39;t see, and then I will. But you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2072"></td>
        <td id="LC2072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mustn&#39;t ever tell anybody--WILL you, Tom? Now you won&#39;t, WILL you?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2073"></td>
        <td id="LC2073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2074"></td>
        <td id="LC2074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No, indeed, indeed I won&#39;t. Now, Becky.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2075"></td>
        <td id="LC2075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2076"></td>
        <td id="LC2076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He turned his face away. She bent timidly around till her breath</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2077"></td>
        <td id="LC2077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stirred his curls and whispered, &quot;I--love--you!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2078"></td>
        <td id="LC2078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2079"></td>
        <td id="LC2079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then she sprang away and ran around and around the desks and benches,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2080"></td>
        <td id="LC2080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with Tom after her, and took refuge in a corner at last, with her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2081"></td>
        <td id="LC2081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little white apron to her face. Tom clasped her about her neck and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2082"></td>
        <td id="LC2082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pleaded:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2083"></td>
        <td id="LC2083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2084"></td>
        <td id="LC2084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Now, Becky, it&#39;s all done--all over but the kiss. Don&#39;t you be afraid</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2085"></td>
        <td id="LC2085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of that--it ain&#39;t anything at all. Please, Becky.&quot; And he tugged at her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2086"></td>
        <td id="LC2086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">apron and the hands.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2087"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2088"></td>
        <td id="LC2088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">By and by she gave up, and let her hands drop; her face, all glowing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2089"></td>
        <td id="LC2089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the struggle, came up and submitted. Tom kissed the red lips and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2090"></td>
        <td id="LC2090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2091"></td>
        <td id="LC2091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2092"></td>
        <td id="LC2092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Now it&#39;s all done, Becky. And always after this, you know, you ain&#39;t</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2093"></td>

        <td id="LC2094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me, ever never and forever. Will you?&quot;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2095"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC2096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No, I&#39;ll never love anybody but you, Tom, and I&#39;ll never marry</td>
