      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2098"></td>
        <td id="LC2098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2099"></td>
        <td id="LC2099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Certainly. Of course. That&#39;s PART of it. And always coming to school</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2100"></td>
        <td id="LC2100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or when we&#39;re going home, you&#39;re to walk with me, when there ain&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2101"></td>
        <td id="LC2101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anybody looking--and you choose me and I choose you at parties, because</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2102"></td>
        <td id="LC2102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that&#39;s the way you do when you&#39;re engaged.&quot;</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L2108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2108"></td>
        <td id="LC2108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The big eyes told Tom his blunder and he stopped, confused.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2109"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC2110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, Tom! Then I ain&#39;t the first you&#39;ve ever been engaged to!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2111"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2112"></td>
        <td id="LC2112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The child began to cry. Tom said:</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2113"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2115"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2117"></td>
        <td id="LC2117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2118"></td>
        <td id="LC2118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom tried to put his arm about her neck, but she pushed him away and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2119"></td>
        <td id="LC2119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turned her face to the wall, and went on crying. Tom tried again, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2120"></td>
        <td id="LC2120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">soothing words in his mouth, and was repulsed again. Then his pride was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2121"></td>
        <td id="LC2121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up, and he strode away and went outside. He stood about, restless and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2122"></td>
        <td id="LC2122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">uneasy, for a while, glancing at the door, every now and then, hoping</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2123"></td>
        <td id="LC2123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she would repent and come to find him. But she did not. Then he began</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2124"></td>
        <td id="LC2124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to feel badly and fear that he was in the wrong. It was a hard struggle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2125"></td>
        <td id="LC2125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with him to make new advances, now, but he nerved himself to it and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2126"></td>
        <td id="LC2126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">entered. She was still standing back there in the corner, sobbing, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2127"></td>
        <td id="LC2127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her face to the wall. Tom&#39;s heart smote him. He went to her and stood a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2129"></td>
        <td id="LC2129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2131"></td>
        <td id="LC2131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2132"></td>
        <td id="LC2132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No reply--but sobs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2133"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC2134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Becky&quot;--pleadingly. &quot;Becky, won&#39;t you say something?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2135"></td>
        <td id="LC2135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2136"></td>
        <td id="LC2136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">More sobs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2137"></td>
        <td id="LC2137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2138"></td>
        <td id="LC2138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom got out his chiefest jewel, a brass knob from the top of an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2139"></td>
        <td id="LC2139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">andiron, and passed it around her so that she could see it, and said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2140"></td>
        <td id="LC2140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2141"></td>
        <td id="LC2141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Please, Becky, won&#39;t you take it?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2142"></td>
        <td id="LC2142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2143"></td>
        <td id="LC2143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She struck it to the floor. Then Tom marched out of the house and over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2144"></td>
        <td id="LC2144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the hills and far away, to return to school no more that day. Presently</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2145"></td>
        <td id="LC2145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Becky began to suspect. She ran to the door; he was not in sight; she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2146"></td>
        <td id="LC2146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flew around to the play-yard; he was not there. Then she called:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2147"></td>
        <td id="LC2147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2148"></td>
        <td id="LC2148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Tom! Come back, Tom!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2149"></td>
        <td id="LC2149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2150"></td>
        <td id="LC2150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She listened intently, but there was no answer. She had no companions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2151"></td>
        <td id="LC2151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but silence and loneliness. So she sat down to cry again and upbraid</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2152"></td>
        <td id="LC2152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">herself; and by this time the scholars began to gather again, and she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2153"></td>
        <td id="LC2153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had to hide her griefs and still her broken heart and take up the cross</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2154"></td>
        <td id="LC2154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a long, dreary, aching afternoon, with none among the strangers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2155"></td>
        <td id="LC2155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about her to exchange sorrows with.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2156"></td>
        <td id="LC2156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2157"></td>
        <td id="LC2157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2158"></td>
        <td id="LC2158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2159"></td>
        <td id="LC2159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER VIII</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2160"></td>
        <td id="LC2160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2161"></td>
        <td id="LC2161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">TOM dodged hither and thither through lanes until he was well out of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2162"></td>
        <td id="LC2162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the track of returning scholars, and then fell into a moody jog. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2163"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L2252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2252"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2253"></td>
        <td id="LC2253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doodle-bug, tell me what I want to know!&quot;</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2255"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC2262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the marble he had just thrown away, and therefore he went and made a</td>

        <td id="LC2264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his treasure-house and carefully placed himself just as he had been</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2317"></td>
        <td id="LC2317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why, that ain&#39;t anything. I can&#39;t fall; that ain&#39;t the way it is in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2318"></td>
        <td id="LC2318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the book. The book says, &#39;Then with one back-handed stroke he slew poor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2319"></td>

        <td id="LC2320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">back.&quot;</td>

        <td id="L2321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2321"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2322"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

      <tr>

</td>

        <td id="L2328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2328"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="LC2331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, say, Joe, you can be Friar Tuck or Much the miller&#39;s son, and</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2332"></td>
        <td id="LC2332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lam me with a quarter-staff; or I&#39;ll be the Sheriff of Nottingham and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2333"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2335"></td>
        <td id="LC2335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This was satisfactory, and so these adventures were carried out. Then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2336"></td>
        <td id="LC2336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom became Robin Hood again, and was allowed by the treacherous nun to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2337"></td>
        <td id="LC2337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bleed his strength away through his neglected wound. And at last Joe,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2338"></td>
        <td id="LC2338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">representing a whole tribe of weeping outlaws, dragged him sadly forth,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2339"></td>
        <td id="LC2339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gave his bow into his feeble hands, and Tom said, &quot;Where this arrow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2340"></td>
        <td id="LC2340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">falls, there bury poor Robin Hood under the greenwood tree.&quot; Then he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2341"></td>
        <td id="LC2341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shot the arrow and fell back and would have died, but he lit on a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2342"></td>
        <td id="LC2342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nettle and sprang up too gaily for a corpse.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2343"></td>
        <td id="LC2343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2344"></td>
        <td id="LC2344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The boys dressed themselves, hid their accoutrements, and went off</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2345"></td>
        <td id="LC2345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grieving that there were no outlaws any more, and wondering what modern</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2346"></td>
        <td id="LC2346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">civilization could claim to have done to compensate for their loss.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2347"></td>
        <td id="LC2347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They said they would rather be outlaws a year in Sherwood Forest than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2348"></td>
        <td id="LC2348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">President of the United States forever.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2349"></td>
        <td id="LC2349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2350"></td>
        <td id="LC2350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2351"></td>
        <td id="LC2351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2352"></td>
        <td id="LC2352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER IX</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2353"></td>
        <td id="LC2353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2354"></td>
        <td id="LC2354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">AT half-past nine, that night, Tom and Sid were sent to bed, as usual.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2355"></td>
        <td id="LC2355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They said their prayers, and Sid was soon asleep. Tom lay awake and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2356"></td>
        <td id="LC2356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waited, in restless impatience. When it seemed to him that it must be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2357"></td>
        <td id="LC2357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nearly daylight, he heard the clock strike ten! This was despair. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2358"></td>
        <td id="LC2358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would have tossed and fidgeted, as his nerves demanded, but he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2359"></td>
        <td id="LC2359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afraid he might wake Sid. So he lay still, and stared up into the dark.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2360"></td>
        <td id="LC2360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Everything was dismally still. By and by, out of the stillness, little,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2361"></td>
        <td id="LC2361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scarcely perceptible noises began to emphasize themselves. The ticking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2362"></td>
        <td id="LC2362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the clock began to bring itself into notice. Old beams began to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2363"></td>
        <td id="LC2363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crack mysteriously. The stairs creaked faintly. Evidently spirits were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2364"></td>
        <td id="LC2364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">abroad. A measured, muffled snore issued from Aunt Polly&#39;s chamber. And</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2365"></td>
        <td id="LC2365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now the tiresome chirping of a cricket that no human ingenuity could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2366"></td>
        <td id="LC2366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">locate, began. Next the ghastly ticking of a deathwatch in the wall at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2367"></td>
        <td id="LC2367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the bed&#39;s head made Tom shudder--it meant that somebody&#39;s days were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2368"></td>
        <td id="LC2368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">numbered. Then the howl of a far-off dog rose on the night air, and was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2369"></td>
        <td id="LC2369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answered by a fainter howl from a remoter distance. Tom was in an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2370"></td>
        <td id="LC2370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">agony. At last he was satisfied that time had ceased and eternity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2371"></td>
        <td id="LC2371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">begun; he began to doze, in spite of himself; the clock chimed eleven,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2372"></td>
        <td id="LC2372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but he did not hear it. And then there came, mingling with his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2373"></td>
        <td id="LC2373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">half-formed dreams, a most melancholy caterwauling. The raising of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2374"></td>
        <td id="LC2374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">neighboring window disturbed him. A cry of &quot;Scat! you devil!&quot; and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2375"></td>
        <td id="LC2375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crash of an empty bottle against the back of his aunt&#39;s woodshed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2376"></td>
        <td id="LC2376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brought him wide awake, and a single minute later he was dressed and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2377"></td>
        <td id="LC2377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out of the window and creeping along the roof of the &quot;ell&quot; on all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2378"></td>
        <td id="LC2378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fours. He &quot;meow&#39;d&quot; with caution once or twice, as he went; then jumped</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2379"></td>
        <td id="LC2379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the roof of the woodshed and thence to the ground. Huckleberry Finn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2380"></td>
        <td id="LC2380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was there, with his dead cat. The boys moved off and disappeared in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2381"></td>
        <td id="LC2381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gloom. At the end of half an hour they were wading through the tall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2382"></td>
        <td id="LC2382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grass of the graveyard.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2383"></td>
        <td id="LC2383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2384"></td>
        <td id="LC2384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was a graveyard of the old-fashioned Western kind. It was on a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2385"></td>
        <td id="LC2385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hill, about a mile and a half from the village. It had a crazy board</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2386"></td>
        <td id="LC2386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fence around it, which leaned inward in places, and outward the rest of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2387"></td>
        <td id="LC2387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the time, but stood upright nowhere. Grass and weeds grew rank over the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2388"></td>
        <td id="LC2388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whole cemetery. All the old graves were sunken in, there was not a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2389"></td>
        <td id="LC2389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tombstone on the place; round-topped, worm-eaten boards staggered over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2390"></td>
        <td id="LC2390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the graves, leaning for support and finding none. &quot;Sacred to the memory</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2391"></td>
        <td id="LC2391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of&quot; So-and-So had been painted on them once, but it could no longer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2392"></td>
        <td id="LC2392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have been read, on the most of them, now, even if there had been light.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2393"></td>
        <td id="LC2393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2394"></td>
        <td id="LC2394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A faint wind moaned through the trees, and Tom feared it might be the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2395"></td>
        <td id="LC2395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spirits of the dead, complaining at being disturbed. The boys talked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2396"></td>
        <td id="LC2396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little, and only under their breath, for the time and the place and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2397"></td>
        <td id="LC2397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pervading solemnity and silence oppressed their spirits. They found the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2398"></td>
        <td id="LC2398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sharp new heap they were seeking, and ensconced themselves within the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2399"></td>
        <td id="LC2399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">protection of three great elms that grew in a bunch within a few feet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2400"></td>
        <td id="LC2400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the grave.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2401"></td>
        <td id="LC2401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2402"></td>
        <td id="LC2402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then they waited in silence for what seemed a long time. The hooting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2403"></td>
        <td id="LC2403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a distant owl was all the sound that troubled the dead stillness.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2404"></td>
        <td id="LC2404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom&#39;s reflections grew oppressive. He must force some talk. So he said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2405"></td>
        <td id="LC2405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in a whisper:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2406"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2407"></td>
        <td id="LC2407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Hucky, do you believe the dead people like it for us to be here?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2408"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2409"></td>
        <td id="LC2409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huckleberry whispered:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2410"></td>
        <td id="LC2410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2411"></td>
        <td id="LC2411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I wisht I knowed. It&#39;s awful solemn like, AIN&#39;T it?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2412"></td>
        <td id="LC2412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2413"></td>
        <td id="LC2413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I bet it is.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2414"></td>
        <td id="LC2414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2415"></td>
        <td id="LC2415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was a considerable pause, while the boys canvassed this matter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2416"></td>
        <td id="LC2416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inwardly. Then Tom whispered:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2417"></td>
        <td id="LC2417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2418"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2421"></td>
        <td id="LC2421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2422"></td>
        <td id="LC2422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom, after a pause:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2423"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2424"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2425"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L2428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2428"></td>
        <td id="LC2428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people, Tom.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2429"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2430"></td>
        <td id="LC2430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This was a damper, and conversation died again.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2431"></td>
        <td id="LC2431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2432"></td>
        <td id="LC2432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Presently Tom seized his comrade&#39;s arm and said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2433"></td>
        <td id="LC2433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2434"></td>
        <td id="LC2434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Sh!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2435"></td>
        <td id="LC2435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2436"></td>
        <td id="LC2436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What is it, Tom?&quot; And the two clung together with beating hearts.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2437"></td>
        <td id="LC2437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2438"></td>
        <td id="LC2438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Sh! There &#39;tis again! Didn&#39;t you hear it?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2439"></td>
        <td id="LC2439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2440"></td>

        <td id="LC2533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doctor, who was now standing. &quot;Five years ago you drove me away from</td>

        <td id="L2539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2539"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2540"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L2623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2623"></td>
        <td id="LC2623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Two or three minutes later the murdered man, the blanketed corpse, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2624"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2637"></td>
        <td id="LC2637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wings to their feet.</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC2717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    they will keep mum</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2900"></td>
        <td id="LC2900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stare of suffering that has reached the limit and can no further go.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2901"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2904"></td>
        <td id="LC2904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sigh followed, and his heart broke. It was his brass andiron knob!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2905"></td>
        <td id="LC2905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2906"></td>
        <td id="LC2906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This final feather broke the camel&#39;s back.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2907"></td>
        <td id="LC2907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2908"></td>
        <td id="LC2908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2909"></td>
        <td id="LC2909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2910"></td>
        <td id="LC2910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XI</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2911"></td>
        <td id="LC2911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2912"></td>
        <td id="LC2912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CLOSE upon the hour of noon the whole village was suddenly electrified</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2913"></td>
        <td id="LC2913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the ghastly news. No need of the as yet undreamed-of telegraph;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2914"></td>
        <td id="LC2914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the tale flew from man to man, from group to group, from house to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2915"></td>
        <td id="LC2915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house, with little less than telegraphic speed. Of course the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2916"></td>
        <td id="LC2916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">schoolmaster gave holiday for that afternoon; the town would have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2917"></td>
        <td id="LC2917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thought strangely of him if he had not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2918"></td>
        <td id="LC2918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2919"></td>
        <td id="LC2919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A gory knife had been found close to the murdered man, and it had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2920"></td>
        <td id="LC2920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recognized by somebody as belonging to Muff Potter--so the story ran.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2921"></td>
        <td id="LC2921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And it was said that a belated citizen had come upon Potter washing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2922"></td>
        <td id="LC2922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself in the &quot;branch&quot; about one or two o&#39;clock in the morning, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2923"></td>
        <td id="LC2923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that Potter had at once sneaked off--suspicious circumstances,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2924"></td>
        <td id="LC2924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">especially the washing which was not a habit with Potter. It was also</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2925"></td>
        <td id="LC2925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said that the town had been ransacked for this &quot;murderer&quot; (the public</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2926"></td>
        <td id="LC2926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are not slow in the matter of sifting evidence and arriving at a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2927"></td>
        <td id="LC2927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">verdict), but that he could not be found. Horsemen had departed down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2928"></td>
        <td id="LC2928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the roads in every direction, and the Sheriff &quot;was confident&quot; that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2929"></td>
        <td id="LC2929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he would be captured before night.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2930"></td>
        <td id="LC2930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2931"></td>
        <td id="LC2931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">All the town was drifting toward the graveyard. Tom&#39;s heartbreak</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2932"></td>
        <td id="LC2932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vanished and he joined the procession, not because he would not a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2933"></td>
        <td id="LC2933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thousand times rather go anywhere else, but because an awful,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2934"></td>
        <td id="LC2934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unaccountable fascination drew him on. Arrived at the dreadful place,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2935"></td>
        <td id="LC2935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he wormed his small body through the crowd and saw the dismal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2936"></td>
        <td id="LC2936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spectacle. It seemed to him an age since he was there before. Somebody</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2937"></td>
        <td id="LC2937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pinched his arm. He turned, and his eyes met Huckleberry&#39;s. Then both</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2938"></td>
        <td id="LC2938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looked elsewhere at once, and wondered if anybody had noticed anything</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2939"></td>
        <td id="LC2939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in their mutual glance. But everybody was talking, and intent upon the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2940"></td>
        <td id="LC2940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grisly spectacle before them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2941"></td>
        <td id="LC2941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2942"></td>
        <td id="LC2942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Poor fellow!&quot; &quot;Poor young fellow!&quot; &quot;This ought to be a lesson to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2943"></td>
        <td id="LC2943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grave robbers!&quot; &quot;Muff Potter&#39;ll hang for this if they catch him!&quot; This</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2944"></td>
        <td id="LC2944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was the drift of remark; and the minister said, &quot;It was a judgment; His</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2945"></td>
        <td id="LC2945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hand is here.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2946"></td>
        <td id="LC2946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2947"></td>
        <td id="LC2947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now Tom shivered from head to heel; for his eye fell upon the stolid</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2948"></td>
        <td id="LC2948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">face of Injun Joe. At this moment the crowd began to sway and struggle,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2949"></td>
        <td id="LC2949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and voices shouted, &quot;It&#39;s him! it&#39;s him! he&#39;s coming himself!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2950"></td>
        <td id="LC2950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2951"></td>
        <td id="LC2951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Who? Who?&quot; from twenty voices.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2952"></td>
        <td id="LC2952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2953"></td>
        <td id="LC2953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Muff Potter!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2954"></td>
        <td id="LC2954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2955"></td>
        <td id="LC2955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Hallo, he&#39;s stopped!--Look out, he&#39;s turning! Don&#39;t let him get away!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2956"></td>
        <td id="LC2956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2957"></td>
        <td id="LC2957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">People in the branches of the trees over Tom&#39;s head said he wasn&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2958"></td>
        <td id="LC2958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trying to get away--he only looked doubtful and perplexed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2959"></td>
        <td id="LC2959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2960"></td>
        <td id="LC2960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Infernal impudence!&quot; said a bystander; &quot;wanted to come and take a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2961"></td>
        <td id="LC2961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quiet look at his work, I reckon--didn&#39;t expect any company.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2962"></td>
        <td id="LC2962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2963"></td>
        <td id="LC2963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The crowd fell apart, now, and the Sheriff came through,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2964"></td>
        <td id="LC2964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ostentatiously leading Potter by the arm. The poor fellow&#39;s face was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2965"></td>
        <td id="LC2965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">haggard, and his eyes showed the fear that was upon him. When he stood</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2966"></td>
        <td id="LC2966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before the murdered man, he shook as with a palsy, and he put his face</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2967"></td>
        <td id="LC2967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in his hands and burst into tears.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2968"></td>
        <td id="LC2968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2969"></td>
        <td id="LC2969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I didn&#39;t do it, friends,&quot; he sobbed; &quot;&#39;pon my word and honor I never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2970"></td>
        <td id="LC2970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">done it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2971"></td>
        <td id="LC2971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2972"></td>
        <td id="LC2972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Who&#39;s accused you?&quot; shouted a voice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2973"></td>
        <td id="LC2973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2974"></td>
        <td id="LC2974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This shot seemed to carry home. Potter lifted his face and looked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2975"></td>
        <td id="LC2975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">around him with a pathetic hopelessness in his eyes. He saw Injun Joe,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2976"></td>
        <td id="LC2976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and exclaimed:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2977"></td>
        <td id="LC2977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2978"></td>
        <td id="LC2978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, Injun Joe, you promised me you&#39;d never--&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2979"></td>
        <td id="LC2979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2980"></td>
        <td id="LC2980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Is that your knife?&quot; and it was thrust before him by the Sheriff.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2981"></td>
        <td id="LC2981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2982"></td>
        <td id="LC2982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Potter would have fallen if they had not caught him and eased him to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2983"></td>
        <td id="LC2983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the ground. Then he said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2984"></td>
        <td id="LC2984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2985"></td>
        <td id="LC2985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Something told me &#39;t if I didn&#39;t come back and get--&quot; He shuddered;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2986"></td>
        <td id="LC2986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then waved his nerveless hand with a vanquished gesture and said, &quot;Tell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2987"></td>
        <td id="LC2987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;em, Joe, tell &#39;em--it ain&#39;t any use any more.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2988"></td>
        <td id="LC2988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2989"></td>
        <td id="LC2989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then Huckleberry and Tom stood dumb and staring, and heard the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2990"></td>
        <td id="LC2990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stony-hearted liar reel off his serene statement, they expecting every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2991"></td>
        <td id="LC2991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moment that the clear sky would deliver God&#39;s lightnings upon his head,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2992"></td>
        <td id="LC2992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and wondering to see how long the stroke was delayed. And when he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2993"></td>
        <td id="LC2993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">finished and still stood alive and whole, their wavering impulse to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2994"></td>
        <td id="LC2994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">break their oath and save the poor betrayed prisoner&#39;s life faded and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2995"></td>
        <td id="LC2995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vanished away, for plainly this miscreant had sold himself to Satan and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2996"></td>
        <td id="LC2996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it would be fatal to meddle with the property of such a power as that.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3089"></td>
        <td id="LC3089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ONE of the reasons why Tom&#39;s mind had drifted away from its secret</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3090"></td>

        <td id="LC3273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">TOM&#39;S mind was made up now. He was gloomy and desperate. He was a</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3459"></td>
        <td id="LC3459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I reckon so,&quot; said Huckleberry; &quot;anyways, I&#39;m suited. I don&#39;t want</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3460"></td>
        <td id="LC3460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing better&#39;n this. I don&#39;t ever get enough to eat, gen&#39;ally--and</td>

        <td id="L3462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3462"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L3463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3463"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3466"></td>

        <td id="L3501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3501"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L3502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3502"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3534"></td>
        <td id="LC3534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Gradually their talk died out and drowsiness began to steal upon the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3535"></td>
        <td id="LC3535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eyelids of the little waifs. The pipe dropped from the fingers of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3536"></td>
        <td id="LC3536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Red-Handed, and he slept the sleep of the conscience-free and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3537"></td>
        <td id="LC3537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weary. The Terror of the Seas and the Black Avenger of the Spanish Main</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3538"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3541"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3542"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3543"></td>
