      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3544"></td>
        <td id="LC3544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of sleep--but an intruder came, now, that would not &quot;down.&quot; It was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3545"></td>
        <td id="LC3545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conscience. They began to feel a vague fear that they had been doing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3546"></td>
        <td id="LC3546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wrong to run away; and next they thought of the stolen meat, and then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3547"></td>
        <td id="LC3547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the real torture came. They tried to argue it away by reminding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3548"></td>
        <td id="LC3548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conscience that they had purloined sweetmeats and apples scores of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3549"></td>
        <td id="LC3549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">times; but conscience was not to be appeased by such thin</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3550"></td>
        <td id="LC3550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">plausibilities; it seemed to them, in the end, that there was no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3551"></td>
        <td id="LC3551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">getting around the stubborn fact that taking sweetmeats was only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3552"></td>
        <td id="LC3552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;hooking,&quot; while taking bacon and hams and such valuables was plain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3553"></td>
        <td id="LC3553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">simple stealing--and there was a command against that in the Bible. So</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3554"></td>
        <td id="LC3554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they inwardly resolved that so long as they remained in the business,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3555"></td>
        <td id="LC3555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their piracies should not again be sullied with the crime of stealing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3556"></td>
        <td id="LC3556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then conscience granted a truce, and these curiously inconsistent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3557"></td>
        <td id="LC3557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pirates fell peacefully to sleep.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3558"></td>
        <td id="LC3558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3559"></td>
        <td id="LC3559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3560"></td>
        <td id="LC3560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3561"></td>
        <td id="LC3561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XIV</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3562"></td>
        <td id="LC3562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3563"></td>
        <td id="LC3563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">WHEN Tom awoke in the morning, he wondered where he was. He sat up and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3564"></td>
        <td id="LC3564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rubbed his eyes and looked around. Then he comprehended. It was the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3565"></td>
        <td id="LC3565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cool gray dawn, and there was a delicious sense of repose and peace in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3566"></td>
        <td id="LC3566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the deep pervading calm and silence of the woods. Not a leaf stirred;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3567"></td>
        <td id="LC3567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not a sound obtruded upon great Nature&#39;s meditation. Beaded dewdrops</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3568"></td>
        <td id="LC3568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stood upon the leaves and grasses. A white layer of ashes covered the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3569"></td>
        <td id="LC3569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fire, and a thin blue breath of smoke rose straight into the air. Joe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3570"></td>
        <td id="LC3570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and Huck still slept.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3571"></td>
        <td id="LC3571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3572"></td>
        <td id="LC3572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now, far away in the woods a bird called; another answered; presently</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3573"></td>
        <td id="LC3573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the hammering of a woodpecker was heard. Gradually the cool dim gray of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3574"></td>
        <td id="LC3574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the morning whitened, and as gradually sounds multiplied and life</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3575"></td>
        <td id="LC3575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manifested itself. The marvel of Nature shaking off sleep and going to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3576"></td>
        <td id="LC3576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">work unfolded itself to the musing boy. A little green worm came</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3577"></td>
        <td id="LC3577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crawling over a dewy leaf, lifting two-thirds of his body into the air</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3578"></td>
        <td id="LC3578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from time to time and &quot;sniffing around,&quot; then proceeding again--for he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3579"></td>
        <td id="LC3579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was measuring, Tom said; and when the worm approached him, of its own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3580"></td>
        <td id="LC3580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accord, he sat as still as a stone, with his hopes rising and falling,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3581"></td>
        <td id="LC3581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by turns, as the creature still came toward him or seemed inclined to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3582"></td>
        <td id="LC3582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">go elsewhere; and when at last it considered a painful moment with its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3583"></td>
        <td id="LC3583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">curved body in the air and then came decisively down upon Tom&#39;s leg and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3584"></td>
        <td id="LC3584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">began a journey over him, his whole heart was glad--for that meant that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3585"></td>
        <td id="LC3585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was going to have a new suit of clothes--without the shadow of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3586"></td>
        <td id="LC3586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doubt a gaudy piratical uniform. Now a procession of ants appeared,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3587"></td>
        <td id="LC3587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from nowhere in particular, and went about their labors; one struggled</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3588"></td>
        <td id="LC3588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manfully by with a dead spider five times as big as itself in its arms,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3589"></td>
        <td id="LC3589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and lugged it straight up a tree-trunk. A brown spotted lady-bug</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3590"></td>
        <td id="LC3590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">climbed the dizzy height of a grass blade, and Tom bent down close to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3591"></td>
        <td id="LC3591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it and said, &quot;Lady-bug, lady-bug, fly away home, your house is on fire,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3592"></td>
        <td id="LC3592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your children&#39;s alone,&quot; and she took wing and went off to see about it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3593"></td>
        <td id="LC3593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">--which did not surprise the boy, for he knew of old that this insect was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3594"></td>
        <td id="LC3594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">credulous about conflagrations, and he had practised upon its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3595"></td>
        <td id="LC3595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">simplicity more than once. A tumblebug came next, heaving sturdily at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3596"></td>
        <td id="LC3596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">its ball, and Tom touched the creature, to see it shut its legs against</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3597"></td>
        <td id="LC3597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">its body and pretend to be dead. The birds were fairly rioting by this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3598"></td>
        <td id="LC3598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time. A catbird, the Northern mocker, lit in a tree over Tom&#39;s head,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3599"></td>
        <td id="LC3599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and trilled out her imitations of her neighbors in a rapture of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3600"></td>
        <td id="LC3600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enjoyment; then a shrill jay swept down, a flash of blue flame, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3601"></td>
        <td id="LC3601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stopped on a twig almost within the boy&#39;s reach, cocked his head to one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3602"></td>
        <td id="LC3602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">side and eyed the strangers with a consuming curiosity; a gray squirrel</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3603"></td>
        <td id="LC3603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and a big fellow of the &quot;fox&quot; kind came skurrying along, sitting up at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3604"></td>
        <td id="LC3604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intervals to inspect and chatter at the boys, for the wild things had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3605"></td>
        <td id="LC3605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">probably never seen a human being before and scarcely knew whether to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3606"></td>
        <td id="LC3606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be afraid or not. All Nature was wide awake and stirring, now; long</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3607"></td>
        <td id="LC3607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lances of sunlight pierced down through the dense foliage far and near,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3608"></td>
        <td id="LC3608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and a few butterflies came fluttering upon the scene.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3609"></td>
        <td id="LC3609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3610"></td>
        <td id="LC3610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom stirred up the other pirates and they all clattered away with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3611"></td>
        <td id="LC3611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shout, and in a minute or two were stripped and chasing after and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3612"></td>
        <td id="LC3612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tumbling over each other in the shallow limpid water of the white</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3613"></td>
        <td id="LC3613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sandbar. They felt no longing for the little village sleeping in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3614"></td>
        <td id="LC3614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distance beyond the majestic waste of water. A vagrant current or a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3615"></td>
        <td id="LC3615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">slight rise in the river had carried off their raft, but this only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3616"></td>
        <td id="LC3616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gratified them, since its going was something like burning the bridge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3617"></td>
        <td id="LC3617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">between them and civilization.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3618"></td>
        <td id="LC3618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3619"></td>
        <td id="LC3619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They came back to camp wonderfully refreshed, glad-hearted, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3620"></td>
        <td id="LC3620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ravenous; and they soon had the camp-fire blazing up again. Huck found</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3621"></td>
        <td id="LC3621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a spring of clear cold water close by, and the boys made cups of broad</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3622"></td>
        <td id="LC3622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">oak or hickory leaves, and felt that water, sweetened with such a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3623"></td>
        <td id="LC3623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wildwood charm as that, would be a good enough substitute for coffee.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3624"></td>
        <td id="LC3624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">While Joe was slicing bacon for breakfast, Tom and Huck asked him to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3625"></td>
        <td id="LC3625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hold on a minute; they stepped to a promising nook in the river-bank</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3626"></td>
        <td id="LC3626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and threw in their lines; almost immediately they had reward. Joe had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3627"></td>
        <td id="LC3627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not had time to get impatient before they were back again with some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3628"></td>
        <td id="LC3628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">handsome bass, a couple of sun-perch and a small catfish--provisions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3629"></td>
        <td id="LC3629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enough for quite a family. They fried the fish with the bacon, and were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3630"></td>
        <td id="LC3630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">astonished; for no fish had ever seemed so delicious before. They did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3631"></td>
        <td id="LC3631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not know that the quicker a fresh-water fish is on the fire after he is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3632"></td>
        <td id="LC3632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">caught the better he is; and they reflected little upon what a sauce</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3633"></td>
        <td id="LC3633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">open-air sleeping, open-air exercise, bathing, and a large ingredient</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3634"></td>
        <td id="LC3634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of hunger make, too.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3635"></td>
        <td id="LC3635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3636"></td>
        <td id="LC3636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They lay around in the shade, after breakfast, while Huck had a smoke,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3637"></td>
        <td id="LC3637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and then went off through the woods on an exploring expedition. They</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3638"></td>
        <td id="LC3638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tramped gayly along, over decaying logs, through tangled underbrush,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3639"></td>
        <td id="LC3639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">among solemn monarchs of the forest, hung from their crowns to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3640"></td>
        <td id="LC3640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ground with a drooping regalia of grape-vines. Now and then they came</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3641"></td>
        <td id="LC3641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon snug nooks carpeted with grass and jeweled with flowers.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3642"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3643"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3644"></td>
        <td id="LC3644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">astonished at. They discovered that the island was about three miles</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3645"></td>

        <td id="L3646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3646"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L3733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3733"></td>
        <td id="LC3733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As twilight drew on, the ferryboat went back to her accustomed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC3734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">business and the skiffs disappeared. The pirates returned to camp. They</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3735"></td>
        <td id="LC3735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were jubilant with vanity over their new grandeur and the illustrious</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3736"></td>
        <td id="LC3736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trouble they were making. They caught fish, cooked supper and ate it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3737"></td>
        <td id="LC3737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and then fell to guessing at what the village was thinking and saying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3738"></td>
        <td id="LC3738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about them; and the pictures they drew of the public distress on their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3739"></td>
        <td id="LC3739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">account were gratifying to look upon--from their point of view. But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3740"></td>
        <td id="LC3740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when the shadows of night closed them in, they gradually ceased to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3741"></td>
        <td id="LC3741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">talk, and sat gazing into the fire, with their minds evidently</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3742"></td>
        <td id="LC3742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wandering elsewhere. The excitement was gone, now, and Tom and Joe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3743"></td>
        <td id="LC3743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could not keep back thoughts of certain persons at home who were not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3744"></td>
        <td id="LC3744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enjoying this fine frolic as much as they were. Misgivings came; they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3745"></td>
        <td id="LC3745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grew troubled and unhappy; a sigh or two escaped, unawares. By and by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3746"></td>
        <td id="LC3746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Joe timidly ventured upon a roundabout &quot;feeler&quot; as to how the others</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3747"></td>
        <td id="LC3747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might look upon a return to civilization--not right now, but--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3748"></td>
        <td id="LC3748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3749"></td>
        <td id="LC3749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom withered him with derision! Huck, being uncommitted as yet, joined</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3750"></td>
        <td id="LC3750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in with Tom, and the waverer quickly &quot;explained,&quot; and was glad to get</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3751"></td>
        <td id="LC3751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out of the scrape with as little taint of chicken-hearted homesickness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3752"></td>
        <td id="LC3752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clinging to his garments as he could. Mutiny was effectually laid to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3753"></td>
        <td id="LC3753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rest for the moment.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3754"></td>
        <td id="LC3754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3755"></td>
        <td id="LC3755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As the night deepened, Huck began to nod, and presently to snore. Joe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3756"></td>
        <td id="LC3756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">followed next. Tom lay upon his elbow motionless, for some time,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3757"></td>
        <td id="LC3757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">watching the two intently. At last he got up cautiously, on his knees,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3758"></td>
        <td id="LC3758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and went searching among the grass and the flickering reflections flung</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3759"></td>
        <td id="LC3759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by the camp-fire. He picked up and inspected several large</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3760"></td>
        <td id="LC3760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">semi-cylinders of the thin white bark of a sycamore, and finally chose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3761"></td>
        <td id="LC3761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">two which seemed to suit him. Then he knelt by the fire and painfully</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3762"></td>
        <td id="LC3762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wrote something upon each of these with his &quot;red keel&quot;; one he rolled up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3763"></td>
        <td id="LC3763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and put in his jacket pocket, and the other he put in Joe&#39;s hat and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3764"></td>
        <td id="LC3764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">removed it to a little distance from the owner. And he also put into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3765"></td>
        <td id="LC3765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hat certain schoolboy treasures of almost inestimable value--among them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3766"></td>
        <td id="LC3766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a lump of chalk, an India-rubber ball, three fishhooks, and one of that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3767"></td>
        <td id="LC3767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kind of marbles known as a &quot;sure &#39;nough crystal.&quot; Then he tiptoed his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3768"></td>
        <td id="LC3768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way cautiously among the trees till he felt that he was out of hearing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3769"></td>
        <td id="LC3769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and straightway broke into a keen run in the direction of the sandbar.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3770"></td>
        <td id="LC3770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3771"></td>
        <td id="LC3771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3772"></td>
        <td id="LC3772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3773"></td>
        <td id="LC3773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XV</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3774"></td>
        <td id="LC3774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3775"></td>
        <td id="LC3775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A FEW minutes later Tom was in the shoal water of the bar, wading</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3776"></td>
        <td id="LC3776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">toward the Illinois shore. Before the depth reached his middle he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3777"></td>
        <td id="LC3777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">half-way over; the current would permit no more wading, now, so he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3778"></td>
        <td id="LC3778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">struck out confidently to swim the remaining hundred yards. He swam</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3779"></td>
        <td id="LC3779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quartering upstream, but still was swept downward rather faster than he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3780"></td>
        <td id="LC3780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had expected. However, he reached the shore finally, and drifted along</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3781"></td>
        <td id="LC3781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">till he found a low place and drew himself out. He put his hand on his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3782"></td>
        <td id="LC3782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">jacket pocket, found his piece of bark safe, and then struck through</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3783"></td>
        <td id="LC3783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the woods, following the shore, with streaming garments. Shortly before</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3784"></td>
        <td id="LC3784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ten o&#39;clock he came out into an open place opposite the village, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3785"></td>
        <td id="LC3785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saw the ferryboat lying in the shadow of the trees and the high bank.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3786"></td>
        <td id="LC3786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Everything was quiet under the blinking stars. He crept down the bank,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3787"></td>
        <td id="LC3787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">watching with all his eyes, slipped into the water, swam three or four</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3788"></td>
        <td id="LC3788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strokes and climbed into the skiff that did &quot;yawl&quot; duty at the boat&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3789"></td>
        <td id="LC3789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stern. He laid himself down under the thwarts and waited, panting.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3790"></td>
        <td id="LC3790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3791"></td>
        <td id="LC3791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Presently the cracked bell tapped and a voice gave the order to &quot;cast</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3792"></td>
        <td id="LC3792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off.&quot; A minute or two later the skiff&#39;s head was standing high up,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3793"></td>
        <td id="LC3793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against the boat&#39;s swell, and the voyage was begun. Tom felt happy in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3794"></td>
        <td id="LC3794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his success, for he knew it was the boat&#39;s last trip for the night. At</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3795"></td>
        <td id="LC3795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the end of a long twelve or fifteen minutes the wheels stopped, and Tom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3796"></td>
        <td id="LC3796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">slipped overboard and swam ashore in the dusk, landing fifty yards</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3797"></td>
        <td id="LC3797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">downstream, out of danger of possible stragglers.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3798"></td>
        <td id="LC3798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3799"></td>
        <td id="LC3799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He flew along unfrequented alleys, and shortly found himself at his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3800"></td>
        <td id="LC3800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">aunt&#39;s back fence. He climbed over, approached the &quot;ell,&quot; and looked in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3801"></td>
        <td id="LC3801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at the sitting-room window, for a light was burning there. There sat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3802"></td>
        <td id="LC3802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Aunt Polly, Sid, Mary, and Joe Harper&#39;s mother, grouped together,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3803"></td>
        <td id="LC3803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">talking. They were by the bed, and the bed was between them and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3804"></td>
        <td id="LC3804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">door. Tom went to the door and began to softly lift the latch; then he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3805"></td>
        <td id="LC3805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pressed gently and the door yielded a crack; he continued pushing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3806"></td>
        <td id="LC3806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cautiously, and quaking every time it creaked, till he judged he might</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3807"></td>
        <td id="LC3807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">squeeze through on his knees; so he put his head through and began,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3808"></td>
        <td id="LC3808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">warily.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3809"></td>
        <td id="LC3809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3810"></td>
        <td id="LC3810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What makes the candle blow so?&quot; said Aunt Polly. Tom hurried up.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3811"></td>
        <td id="LC3811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why, that door&#39;s open, I believe. Why, of course it is. No end of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3812"></td>
        <td id="LC3812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strange things now. Go &#39;long and shut it, Sid.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3813"></td>
        <td id="LC3813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3814"></td>
        <td id="LC3814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom disappeared under the bed just in time. He lay and &quot;breathed&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3815"></td>
        <td id="LC3815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself for a time, and then crept to where he could almost touch his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3816"></td>
        <td id="LC3816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">aunt&#39;s foot.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3817"></td>
        <td id="LC3817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3818"></td>
        <td id="LC3818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But as I was saying,&quot; said Aunt Polly, &quot;he warn&#39;t BAD, so to say</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3819"></td>
        <td id="LC3819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">--only mischEEvous. Only just giddy, and harum-scarum, you know. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3820"></td>
        <td id="LC3820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">warn&#39;t any more responsible than a colt. HE never meant any harm, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3821"></td>
        <td id="LC3821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was the best-hearted boy that ever was&quot;--and she began to cry.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3822"></td>
        <td id="LC3822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3823"></td>
        <td id="LC3823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It was just so with my Joe--always full of his devilment, and up to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3824"></td>
        <td id="LC3824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every kind of mischief, but he was just as unselfish and kind as he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3825"></td>
        <td id="LC3825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could be--and laws bless me, to think I went and whipped him for taking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3826"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3901"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC3909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">skiff, arguing that it might be considered a ship and therefore</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC3911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made for it and that might end in revelations. So he stepped ashore and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3912"></td>
        <td id="LC3912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">entered the woods.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3913"></td>
        <td id="LC3913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3914"></td>
        <td id="LC3914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He sat down and took a long rest, torturing himself meanwhile to keep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3915"></td>
        <td id="LC3915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">awake, and then started warily down the home-stretch. The night was far</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3916"></td>
        <td id="LC3916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spent. It was broad daylight before he found himself fairly abreast the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3917"></td>
        <td id="LC3917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">island bar. He rested again until the sun was well up and gilding the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3918"></td>
        <td id="LC3918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great river with its splendor, and then he plunged into the stream. A</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3919"></td>
        <td id="LC3919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little later he paused, dripping, upon the threshold of the camp, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3920"></td>
        <td id="LC3920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heard Joe say:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3921"></td>
        <td id="LC3921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3922"></td>
        <td id="LC3922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No, Tom&#39;s true-blue, Huck, and he&#39;ll come back. He won&#39;t desert. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3923"></td>
        <td id="LC3923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knows that would be a disgrace to a pirate, and Tom&#39;s too proud for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3924"></td>
        <td id="LC3924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that sort of thing. He&#39;s up to something or other. Now I wonder what?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3925"></td>
        <td id="LC3925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3926"></td>
        <td id="LC3926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, the things is ours, anyway, ain&#39;t they?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3927"></td>
        <td id="LC3927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3928"></td>
        <td id="LC3928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Pretty near, but not yet, Huck. The writing says they are if he ain&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3929"></td>
        <td id="LC3929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">back here to breakfast.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3930"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3931"></td>
        <td id="LC3931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Which he is!&quot; exclaimed Tom, with fine dramatic effect, stepping</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3932"></td>
        <td id="LC3932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grandly into camp.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3933"></td>
        <td id="LC3933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3934"></td>
        <td id="LC3934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A sumptuous breakfast of bacon and fish was shortly provided, and as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3935"></td>
        <td id="LC3935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the boys set to work upon it, Tom recounted (and adorned) his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3936"></td>
        <td id="LC3936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">adventures. They were a vain and boastful company of heroes when the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3937"></td>
        <td id="LC3937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tale was done. Then Tom hid himself away in a shady nook to sleep till</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3938"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3939"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3940"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3941"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3942"></td>
        <td id="LC3942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XVI</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3943"></td>
        <td id="LC3943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3944"></td>
        <td id="LC3944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">AFTER dinner all the gang turned out to hunt for turtle eggs on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3945"></td>
        <td id="LC3945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bar. They went about poking sticks into the sand, and when they found a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3946"></td>
        <td id="LC3946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">soft place they went down on their knees and dug with their hands.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3947"></td>
        <td id="LC3947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sometimes they would take fifty or sixty eggs out of one hole. They</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3948"></td>
        <td id="LC3948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were perfectly round white things a trifle smaller than an English</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3949"></td>
        <td id="LC3949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">walnut. They had a famous fried-egg feast that night, and another on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3950"></td>
        <td id="LC3950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Friday morning.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3951"></td>
        <td id="LC3951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3952"></td>
        <td id="LC3952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After breakfast they went whooping and prancing out on the bar, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3953"></td>
        <td id="LC3953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chased each other round and round, shedding clothes as they went, until</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3954"></td>
        <td id="LC3954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they were naked, and then continued the frolic far away up the shoal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3955"></td>
        <td id="LC3955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">water of the bar, against the stiff current, which latter tripped their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3956"></td>
        <td id="LC3956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">legs from under them from time to time and greatly increased the fun.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3957"></td>
        <td id="LC3957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And now and then they stooped in a group and splashed water in each</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3958"></td>
        <td id="LC3958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other&#39;s faces with their palms, gradually approaching each other, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3959"></td>
        <td id="LC3959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">averted faces to avoid the strangling sprays, and finally gripping and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3960"></td>
        <td id="LC3960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">struggling till the best man ducked his neighbor, and then they all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3961"></td>
        <td id="LC3961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">went under in a tangle of white legs and arms and came up blowing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3962"></td>
        <td id="LC3962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sputtering, laughing, and gasping for breath at one and the same time.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3963"></td>
        <td id="LC3963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3964"></td>
        <td id="LC3964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When they were well exhausted, they would run out and sprawl on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3965"></td>
        <td id="LC3965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dry, hot sand, and lie there and cover themselves up with it, and by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3966"></td>
        <td id="LC3966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and by break for the water again and go through the original</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3967"></td>
        <td id="LC3967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">performance once more. Finally it occurred to them that their naked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3968"></td>
        <td id="LC3968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">skin represented flesh-colored &quot;tights&quot; very fairly; so they drew a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3969"></td>
        <td id="LC3969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ring in the sand and had a circus--with three clowns in it, for none</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3970"></td>
        <td id="LC3970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would yield this proudest post to his neighbor.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3971"></td>
        <td id="LC3971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3972"></td>
        <td id="LC3972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Next they got their marbles and played &quot;knucks&quot; and &quot;ring-taw&quot; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3973"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3974"></td>
        <td id="LC3974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">swim, but Tom would not venture, because he found that in kicking off</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3975"></td>
        <td id="LC3975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his trousers he had kicked his string of rattlesnake rattles off his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3976"></td>
        <td id="LC3976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ankle, and he wondered how he had escaped cramp so long without the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3977"></td>
        <td id="LC3977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">protection of this mysterious charm. He did not venture again until he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3978"></td>
        <td id="LC3978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had found it, and by that time the other boys were tired and ready to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3979"></td>
        <td id="LC3979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rest. They gradually wandered apart, dropped into the &quot;dumps,&quot; and fell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3980"></td>
        <td id="LC3980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to gazing longingly across the wide river to where the village lay</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3981"></td>
        <td id="LC3981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drowsing in the sun. Tom found himself writing &quot;BECKY&quot; in the sand with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3982"></td>
        <td id="LC3982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his big toe; he scratched it out, and was angry with himself for his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3983"></td>
        <td id="LC3983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weakness. But he wrote it again, nevertheless; he could not help it. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3984"></td>
        <td id="LC3984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">erased it once more and then took himself out of temptation by driving</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3985"></td>
        <td id="LC3985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the other boys together and joining them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3986"></td>
        <td id="LC3986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3987"></td>
        <td id="LC3987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But Joe&#39;s spirits had gone down almost beyond resurrection. He was so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3988"></td>
        <td id="LC3988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">homesick that he could hardly endure the misery of it. The tears lay</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3989"></td>
        <td id="LC3989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very near the surface. Huck was melancholy, too. Tom was downhearted,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3990"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3991"></td>
        <td id="LC3991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to tell, yet, but if this mutinous depression was not broken up soon,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3992"></td>
        <td id="LC3992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he would have to bring it out. He said, with a great show of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3993"></td>
        <td id="LC3993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cheerfulness:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3994"></td>
        <td id="LC3994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3995"></td>
        <td id="LC3995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I bet there&#39;s been pirates on this island before, boys. We&#39;ll explore</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3996"></td>
        <td id="LC3996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it again. They&#39;ve hid treasures here somewhere. How&#39;d you feel to light</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3997"></td>
        <td id="LC3997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on a rotten chest full of gold and silver--hey?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3998"></td>
        <td id="LC3998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3999"></td>
        <td id="LC3999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But it roused only faint enthusiasm, which faded out, with no reply.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4000"></td>
        <td id="LC4000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom tried one or two other seductions; but they failed, too. It was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4001"></td>
        <td id="LC4001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discouraging work. Joe sat poking up the sand with a stick and looking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4002"></td>
        <td id="LC4002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very gloomy. Finally he said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4003"></td>
        <td id="LC4003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4004"></td>
        <td id="LC4004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, boys, let&#39;s give it up. I want to go home. It&#39;s so lonesome.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4005"></td>
        <td id="LC4005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4006"></td>
        <td id="LC4006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh no, Joe, you&#39;ll feel better by and by,&quot; said Tom. &quot;Just think of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4007"></td>
        <td id="LC4007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the fishing that&#39;s here.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4008"></td>
        <td id="LC4008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4009"></td>
        <td id="LC4009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I don&#39;t care for fishing. I want to go home.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4010"></td>
        <td id="LC4010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4011"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4012"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4013"></td>
        <td id="LC4013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Swimming&#39;s no good. I don&#39;t seem to care for it, somehow, when there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4014"></td>
        <td id="LC4014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ain&#39;t anybody to say I sha&#39;n&#39;t go in. I mean to go home.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4015"></td>
        <td id="LC4015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4016"></td>
        <td id="LC4016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, shucks! Baby! You want to see your mother, I reckon.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4017"></td>
        <td id="LC4017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4018"></td>
        <td id="LC4018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes, I DO want to see my mother--and you would, too, if you had one.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4019"></td>
        <td id="LC4019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I ain&#39;t any more baby than you are.&quot; And Joe snuffled a little.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4020"></td>
        <td id="LC4020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4021"></td>
        <td id="LC4021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, we&#39;ll let the cry-baby go home to his mother, won&#39;t we, Huck?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4022"></td>
        <td id="LC4022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Poor thing--does it want to see its mother? And so it shall. You like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4023"></td>
        <td id="LC4023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it here, don&#39;t you, Huck? We&#39;ll stay, won&#39;t we?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4024"></td>
        <td id="LC4024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4025"></td>
        <td id="LC4025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck said, &quot;Y-e-s&quot;--without any heart in it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4026"></td>
        <td id="LC4026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4027"></td>
        <td id="LC4027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I&#39;ll never speak to you again as long as I live,&quot; said Joe, rising.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4028"></td>
        <td id="LC4028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;There now!&quot; And he moved moodily away and began to dress himself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4029"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4030"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4031"></td>
        <td id="LC4031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laughed at. Oh, you&#39;re a nice pirate. Huck and me ain&#39;t cry-babies.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4032"></td>
        <td id="LC4032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We&#39;ll stay, won&#39;t we, Huck? Let him go if he wants to. I reckon we can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4033"></td>

        <td id="L4034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4034"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4035"></td>
        <td id="LC4035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But Tom was uneasy, nevertheless, and was alarmed to see Joe go</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4036"></td>
        <td id="LC4036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sullenly on with his dressing. And then it was discomforting to see</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4037"></td>
        <td id="LC4037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck eying Joe&#39;s preparations so wistfully, and keeping up such an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4038"></td>
        <td id="LC4038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ominous silence. Presently, without a parting word, Joe began to wade</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4039"></td>
        <td id="LC4039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off toward the Illinois shore. Tom&#39;s heart began to sink. He glanced at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4040"></td>
        <td id="LC4040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck. Huck could not bear the look, and dropped his eyes. Then he said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4041"></td>
        <td id="LC4041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

</td>

      </tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L4051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4051"></td>
        <td id="LC4051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck began to pick up his scattered clothes. He said:</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4052"></td>

</td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4057"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4058"></td>
        <td id="LC4058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Huck started sorrowfully away, and Tom stood looking after him, with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4059"></td>
        <td id="LC4059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strong desire tugging at his heart to yield his pride and go along too.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4060"></td>
        <td id="LC4060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He hoped the boys would stop, but they still waded slowly on. It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4061"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4062"></td>
        <td id="LC4062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made one final struggle with his pride, and then darted after his</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4063"></td>
        <td id="LC4063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">comrades, yelling:</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4064"></td>

</td>
