        <td id="LC4065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Wait! Wait! I want to tell you something!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4066"></td>
        <td id="LC4066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4067"></td>
        <td id="LC4067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They presently stopped and turned around. When he got to where they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4068"></td>
        <td id="LC4068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were, he began unfolding his secret, and they listened moodily till at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4069"></td>
        <td id="LC4069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">last they saw the &quot;point&quot; he was driving at, and then they set up a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4070"></td>
        <td id="LC4070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">war-whoop of applause and said it was &quot;splendid!&quot; and said if he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4071"></td>
        <td id="LC4071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">told them at first, they wouldn&#39;t have started away. He made a plausible</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC4072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">excuse; but his real reason had been the fear that not even the secret</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4073"></td>
        <td id="LC4073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would keep them with him any very great length of time, and so he had</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4074"></td>
        <td id="LC4074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meant to hold it in reserve as a last seduction.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4075"></td>
        <td id="LC4075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4076"></td>
        <td id="LC4076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The lads came gayly back and went at their sports again with a will,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4077"></td>
        <td id="LC4077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chattering all the time about Tom&#39;s stupendous plan and admiring the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4078"></td>
        <td id="LC4078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">genius of it. After a dainty egg and fish dinner, Tom said he wanted to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4079"></td>
        <td id="LC4079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">learn to smoke, now. Joe caught at the idea and said he would like to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4080"></td>
        <td id="LC4080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">try, too. So Huck made pipes and filled them. These novices had never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4081"></td>
        <td id="LC4081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">smoked anything before but cigars made of grape-vine, and they &quot;bit&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4082"></td>
        <td id="LC4082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the tongue, and were not considered manly anyway.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4083"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4084"></td>
        <td id="LC4084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now they stretched themselves out on their elbows and began to puff,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4085"></td>
        <td id="LC4085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">charily, and with slender confidence. The smoke had an unpleasant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4086"></td>
        <td id="LC4086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">taste, and they gagged a little, but Tom said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4087"></td>
        <td id="LC4087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4088"></td>
        <td id="LC4088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why, it&#39;s just as easy! If I&#39;d a knowed this was all, I&#39;d a learnt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC4089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long ago.&quot;</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4090"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4091"></td>
        <td id="LC4091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;So would I,&quot; said Joe. &quot;It&#39;s just nothing.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4092"></td>
        <td id="LC4092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4093"></td>
        <td id="LC4093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why, many a time I&#39;ve looked at people smoking, and thought well I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4094"></td>
        <td id="LC4094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wish I could do that; but I never thought I could,&quot; said Tom.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4095"></td>
        <td id="LC4095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4096"></td>
        <td id="LC4096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;That&#39;s just the way with me, hain&#39;t it, Huck? You&#39;ve heard me talk</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4097"></td>
        <td id="LC4097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just that way--haven&#39;t you, Huck? I&#39;ll leave it to Huck if I haven&#39;t.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4098"></td>
        <td id="LC4098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4099"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4190"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L4276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4276"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4277"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4280"></td>
        <td id="LC4280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be seriously uncomfortable. They were not likely to fool away this high</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4281"></td>
        <td id="LC4281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">promise for lack of effort. No, they practised cautiously, after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4282"></td>
        <td id="LC4282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">supper, with right fair success, and so they spent a jubilant evening.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4283"></td>
        <td id="LC4283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They were prouder and happier in their new acquirement than they would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4284"></td>
        <td id="LC4284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have been in the scalping and skinning of the Six Nations. We will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4285"></td>
        <td id="LC4285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leave them to smoke and chatter and brag, since we have no further use</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4286"></td>
        <td id="LC4286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for them at present.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4291"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4292"></td>
        <td id="LC4292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">BUT there was no hilarity in the little town that same tranquil</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4293"></td>
        <td id="LC4293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Saturday afternoon. The Harpers, and Aunt Polly&#39;s family, were being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4294"></td>
        <td id="LC4294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">put into mourning, with great grief and many tears. An unusual quiet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4295"></td>
        <td id="LC4295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possessed the village, although it was ordinarily quiet enough, in all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4296"></td>
        <td id="LC4296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conscience. The villagers conducted their concerns with an absent air,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4297"></td>
        <td id="LC4297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and talked little; but they sighed often. The Saturday holiday seemed a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4298"></td>
        <td id="LC4298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">burden to the children. They had no heart in their sports, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4299"></td>
        <td id="LC4299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gradually gave them up.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4300"></td>
        <td id="LC4300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4301"></td>
        <td id="LC4301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the afternoon Becky Thatcher found herself moping about the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4302"></td>
        <td id="LC4302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deserted schoolhouse yard, and feeling very melancholy. But she found</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4303"></td>
        <td id="LC4303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing there to comfort her. She soliloquized:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4304"></td>
        <td id="LC4304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4305"></td>
        <td id="LC4305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, if I only had a brass andiron-knob again! But I haven&#39;t got</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC4306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anything now to remember him by.&quot; And she choked back a little sob.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4307"></td>
        <td id="LC4307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4308"></td>
        <td id="LC4308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Presently she stopped, and said to herself:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4309"></td>
        <td id="LC4309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4310"></td>
        <td id="LC4310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It was right here. Oh, if it was to do over again, I wouldn&#39;t say</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4311"></td>
        <td id="LC4311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that--I wouldn&#39;t say it for the whole world. But he&#39;s gone now; I&#39;ll</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4312"></td>
        <td id="LC4312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never, never, never see him any more.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4313"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L4314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4314"></
